data.text: Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:
“Onipa ba, ka kyerɛ Tiro sodifoɔ no sɛ: ‘Yei ne deɛ Otumfoɔ Awurade seɛ:
Wonim nyansa sene Daniel anaa?
Wonam wo nyansa ne nhunumu so
Wonam wʼadwadie mu nyansa so
“ ‘Ɛno enti sei na Otumfoɔ Awurade seɛ:
mede ananafoɔ reba abɛtia wo,
Wɔde wo bɛto amena no mu,
Afei wobɛka sɛ, “Meyɛ onyame,”
Wobɛwu momonotofoɔ wuo
Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:
“Onipa ba, ma kwadwom a ɛfa Tirohene ho a ka kyerɛ no sɛ: ‘Yei ne deɛ Otumfoɔ Awurade seɛ:
Na anka wowɔ Eden
Wɔsraa wo ngo sɛ ɔhwɛfoɔ Kerub,
Na anka wʼakwan ho nni asɛm
Wʼadwadie a emu trɛ no enti
Wo horanee wɔ wʼakoma mu
Wode wo nnebɔne ne adwadie mu nsisie
Aman a na wɔnim woɔ nyinaa
Awurade asɛm baa me nkyɛn sɛ:
“Onipa ba, fa wʼani kyerɛ Sidon na hyɛ nkɔm tia no
na ka sɛ: ‘Yei ne deɛ Otumfoɔ Awurade seɛ:
Mɛma ɔyaredɔm aba wo so
“ ‘Na Israelfoɔ rennya ayɔnkofoɔ a wɔwɔ adwemmɔne, wɔn a wɔwowɔ yayaaya sɛ ɔhwerɛm ne nkasɛɛ bio. Afei na wɔbɛhunu sɛ mene Otumfoɔ Awurade no.

“ ‘Yei ne deɛ Otumfoɔ Awurade seɛ: Sɛ meboa Israelfoɔ ano firi aman a wabɔ wɔn apete no so a, mɛda me kronkronyɛ adi wɔ wɔn mu, ama amanaman no ahunu. Afei wɔbɛtena wɔn ankasa asase a mede maa me ɔsomfoɔ Yakob no so.

Wɔbɛtena hɔ asomdwoeɛ mu na wɔbɛsisi adan, ayeyɛ bobe nturo; Wɔbɛtena ase asomdwoeɛ mu wɔ ɛberɛ a matwe nʼayɔnkofoɔ a wɔkasa tiaa no no nyinaa aso. Afei wɔbɛhunu sɛ mene Awurade, wɔn Onyankopɔn no.’ ”
